New Records: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. surpassed George Bell for the most total bases by a Blue Jays player in a 42-game span with 135 total bases from July to September 2024.
Key Match Events: The Toronto Blue Jays lost a 10-9 slugfest against the Philadelphia Phillies after leading 6-1 in the first inning.
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit a two-run home run during the sixth inning.
